title: 漏斗漏一个物品的时间是几tick
author: 哈鱼

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 1秒 2.5物品【大概】 所以 8ticks 左右

楼上都用猜的
调取资源事实默认7

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 4 redstone ticks (8 game ticks, or 0.4 seconds barring lag)

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
